attributes.action: better regulation of internet poker sites,if this cannot be done then ban u,k residents from playing for real money just like the u,s government have done for there citizens,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: for the simple reason unless we come up with,on the spot snap inspections for the offices were these so called "random number" generated computors are,then how do we know that the people of the u,k are not just being milked by any organised crime gang that decides to open up an internet poker site designed right from the start to cheat you out of your money,is apsolutly disgracful that you are not doing this already! i can name 1 site that is obviously as bent as a 9 bob note,that site being P,K,R poker,how many more of these sites are out there? god only knows!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
